product_name: The North Face Montana Insulated Mittens - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Montana insulated mittens provide young snow hounds with the insulated and waterproof protection they need for alpine fun in cold and wet weather. HyVent(R) nylon shells are waterproof, breathable and windproof for wide range of comfort. Heatseeker(TM) polyester insulation provides warmth without bulkiness for enhanced dexterity. Synthetic leather palms add grip and durability. Articulated design helps keep hands in their natural relaxed position. The North Face Montana insulated mittens feature full-coverage gauntlet cuffs that help seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth.
short_description: The North Face Montana insulated mittens provide young snow hounds with the insulated and waterproof protection they need for alpine fun in cold and wet weather.
